sub_title: Engineering Manager at eBay Ads | Developing top-notch promoted listing solutions
summary:
Software architect and Engineering leader in a wide variety of web-sites, e-commerce solutions and web-applications built with Node.js, Express.js and React.

Passionate and high skilled Full-stack Web Developer with more than 18 years of experience. 

Main areas of activities are:
* Frontend development using vanilla Javascript/Typescript, HTML5, CSS3 and React
* Backend development with Node.js and Express.js
* Web-applications high performance, scalability and optimisation.
* Web-applications security
* DevOps and Continuous Integration
* Test / Behavior Driven Development


Author of the articles and presentations about about web-development, Node.js, Drupal and Redis.
